data.name: Visual Novel Maker - Japanese School Girls - The Music of Their Stories
data.detailed_description:
Let this music pack help you tell your story through the magical world view of Japanese School girls and their interesting culture

Features:

* 30 BGM and 20 ME
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
